    spx.getBlueKaiValues = function () {
   var o = {};
   var translatePageType = {
     "ticker":"live",
     "home":"homepage",
     "index":"list",
     "newslist":"list",
     "diashow":"gallery" 
   }
   o.pageType = translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] ? translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] : spx.pgi.pageType;  
   if (o.pageType == 'article') {
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 6) o.pageType = 'match';
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 4) o.pageType = 'live';
   }
 
   //o.pagePrimaryTag = spx.pgi.catNames.split('/').pop();
   o.pagePrimaryTag = 'Tennis';
   if (spx.pgi.author) {
     o.pageAuthor = spx.pgi.author; 
   }
   o.ul = spx.cntr.getOrig().toUpperCase();
   
   return o;
 };

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var edi = spx.cntr.get();
     var el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     if (!el) {
       edi = spx.cntr.getOrig();
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     if (!el) {
       edi = "de";
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     var s = el.innerHTML;
     var el2 = document.querySelector('.nvsrc.'+edi);
     var nv = el2.innerHTML;     
     s = s.substring('<!--'.length, s.length - '-->'.length);
     s = s.replace(/\<===/g, '<!--');    
     s = s.replace(/===\>/g, '-->');
     s = s.replace(/###navph###/g, nv);
     document.getElementById('spxhdsrc').innerHTML = '';
     document.write(s);
   </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var dazn = window.dazn || {};
 dazn.daznLiveWidget=function(id){
   this.el = document.getElementById(id);
   this.elScroll = this.el.querySelector('.inner')
   var viewWidth = this.elScroll.offsetWidth;
   var viewLeft = this.elScroll.offsetLeft;
   var ctWidth = this.el.querySelector('.inner .measurePoint').offsetLeft;
   this.scrollMax = ctWidth - viewWidth - viewLeft;
   var itmWidth = this.elScroll.querySelector('.itm').offsetWidth;
   this.stepWidth = Math.floor(viewWidth / itmWidth) * itmWidth;
   this.scrollV = 0; 
   /*console.log('%c' + 'viewWidth: ' + viewWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'ctWidth: ' + ctWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'viewLeft: ' + viewLeft, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'scrollMax: ' + this.scrollMax, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');
   console.log('%c' + 'stepWidth: ' + this.stepWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');*/
 
 
   this.eNL = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .left');
   this.eNR = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .right');
   if (this.scrollMax > 1) {
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', false);
   }
   
   var T = this;
   this.eNR.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll( 1);});  
   this.eNL.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll(-1);});
 }
 dazn.daznLiveWidget.prototype={
   scroll : function (v) {
     try { countPI(); } catch (ex) {}
     // google analytics track rotation by click
     try {
       var metricValue = '1';
       ga('set', 'metric1', metricValue);
       ga('send', 'event', 'daznscroll', 'click');
     } catch (ex) {}
 
     // no action scroll is at start
     if (v < 0 && this.scrollV == 0) {return;}
     // no action if text is at end
     if (v > 0 && this.scrollV >= this.scrollMax) {return;}
 
     this.scrollV = this.scrollV + this.stepWidth * v;
     if (this.scrollV < 0) this.scrollV = 0;
     if (this.scrollV > this.scrollMax) {this.scrollV = this.scrollMax;}
     this.elScroll.setAttribute('style', 'transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 600ms;transform: translate3d(-'+this.scrollV+'px, 0px, 0px);');
     
     spx.setClass(this.eNL, 'off', v <  1 && this.scrollV == 0);
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', v > -1 && this.scrollV == this.scrollMax);
 
     window.setTimeout('spx.dynpics.activateVisiblePicturefills();', 600);
   }
   
 }
         </script>

                 <div class="i">
                  <div class="itm">
                   <span class="time">
                    22.06.
                   </span>
                   <span class="tit">
                    <a href="/de/tennisnet/turniere/atp/1806/Artikel/podcast-gerry-weber-open-der-viertelfinal-tag-mit-roger-federer.html">
                     <b>
                      ATP
                     </b>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    spx.getBlueKaiValues = function () {
   var o = {};
   var translatePageType = {
     "ticker":"live",
     "home":"homepage",
     "index":"list",
     "newslist":"list",
     "diashow":"gallery" 
   }
   o.pageType = translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] ? translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] : spx.pgi.pageType;  
   if (o.pageType == 'article') {
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 6) o.pageType = 'match';
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 4) o.pageType = 'live';
   }
 
   //o.pagePrimaryTag = spx.pgi.catNames.split('/').pop();
   o.pagePrimaryTag = 'Tennis';
   if (spx.pgi.author) {
     o.pageAuthor = spx.pgi.author; 
   }
   o.ul = spx.cntr.getOrig().toUpperCase();
   
   return o;
 };
 
 
 window.bk_async = function() {
 
   //console.log("%c BlueKai ", 'background: #22a; color: #fff; font-size: 24px; padding:3px;');
 
   var o = spx.getBlueKaiValues();
 
   //console.log('spx.pgi:', spx.pgi);
   //console.log('BlueKai values:', o);
 
   bk_allow_multiple_calls = true;
   bk_use_multiple_iframes = true;
 
   bk_addPageCtx('page_type', o.pageType);
   bk_addPageCtx('page_primary_tag', o.pagePrimaryTag);
   if (o.pageAuthor) {
     bk_addPageCtx('page_author', o.pageAuthor);    
   }
   bk_addPageCtx('user_country_code', o.ul);
   bk_addPageCtx('user_language_code', 'de-' + o.ul);
 
   BKTAG.doTag(54514, 1); 
 };

   var s = document.createElement('script');
   s.async = true;
   s.src = "//tags.bkrtx.com/js/bk-coretag.js";
   scripts.parentNode.insertBefore(s, scripts);
 }());
   </script>

     <ul class="lvl1">
      <span class="pgCenterP">
       <span class="pgCenterC">
        <li class="itm itm1 sni239774 ov">
         <a class="ct" href="/de/sport/fussball/index.html">
          Fußball
         </a>
         <ul class="lvl1over">
          <span class="pgCenterP">
           <span class="pgCenterC">
            <li class="itm itm2 imp">
             <a class="ct" href="/de/sport/fussball/index.html">
              Fußball
             </a>
            </li>
            <li class="sep">

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var edi = spx.cntr.get();
     var el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     if (!el) {
       edi = spx.cntr.getOrig();
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     if (!el) {
       edi = "de";
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     var s = el.innerHTML;
     var el2 = document.querySelector('.nvsrc.'+edi);
     var nv = el2.innerHTML;     
     s = s.substring('<!--'.length, s.length - '-->'.length);
     s = s.replace(/\<===/g, '<!--');    
     s = s.replace(/===\>/g, '-->');
     s = s.replace(/###navph###/g, nv);
     document.getElementById('spxhdsrc').innerHTML = '';
     document.write(s);
   </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var dazn = window.dazn || {};
 dazn.daznLiveWidget=function(id){
   this.el = document.getElementById(id);
   this.elScroll = this.el.querySelector('.inner')
   var viewWidth = this.elScroll.offsetWidth;
   var viewLeft = this.elScroll.offsetLeft;
   var ctWidth = this.el.querySelector('.inner .measurePoint').offsetLeft;
   this.scrollMax = ctWidth - viewWidth - viewLeft;
   var itmWidth = this.elScroll.querySelector('.itm').offsetWidth;
   this.stepWidth = Math.floor(viewWidth / itmWidth) * itmWidth;
   this.scrollV = 0; 
   /*console.log('%c' + 'viewWidth: ' + viewWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'ctWidth: ' + ctWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'viewLeft: ' + viewLeft, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'scrollMax: ' + this.scrollMax, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');
   console.log('%c' + 'stepWidth: ' + this.stepWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');*/
 
 
   this.eNL = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .left');
   this.eNR = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .right');
   if (this.scrollMax > 1) {
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', false);
   }
   
   var T = this;
   this.eNR.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll( 1);});  
   this.eNL.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll(-1);});
 }
 dazn.daznLiveWidget.prototype={
   scroll : function (v) {
     try { countPI(); } catch (ex) {}
     // google analytics track rotation by click
     try {
       var metricValue = '1';
       ga('set', 'metric1', metricValue);
       ga('send', 'event', 'daznscroll', 'click');
     } catch (ex) {}
 
     // no action scroll is at start
     if (v < 0 && this.scrollV == 0) {return;}
     // no action if text is at end
     if (v > 0 && this.scrollV >= this.scrollMax) {return;}
 
     this.scrollV = this.scrollV + this.stepWidth * v;
     if (this.scrollV < 0) this.scrollV = 0;
     if (this.scrollV > this.scrollMax) {this.scrollV = this.scrollMax;}
     this.elScroll.setAttribute('style', 'transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 600ms;transform: translate3d(-'+this.scrollV+'px, 0px, 0px);');
     
     spx.setClass(this.eNL, 'off', v <  1 && this.scrollV == 0);
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', v > -1 && this.scrollV == this.scrollMax);
 
     window.setTimeout('spx.dynpics.activateVisiblePicturefills();', 600);
   }
   
 }
         </script>

    spx.getBlueKaiValues = function () {
   var o = {};
   var translatePageType = {
     "ticker":"live",
     "home":"homepage",
     "index":"list",
     "newslist":"list",
     "diashow":"gallery" 
   }
   o.pageType = translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] ? translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] : spx.pgi.pageType;  
   if (o.pageType == 'article') {
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 6) o.pageType = 'match';
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 4) o.pageType = 'live';
   }
 
   //o.pagePrimaryTag = spx.pgi.catNames.split('/').pop();
   o.pagePrimaryTag = 'Tennis';
   if (spx.pgi.author) {
     o.pageAuthor = spx.pgi.author; 
   }
   o.ul = spx.cntr.getOrig().toUpperCase();
   
   return o;
 };

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var edi = spx.cntr.get();
     var el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     if (!el) {
       edi = spx.cntr.getOrig();
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     if (!el) {
       edi = "de";
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     var s = el.innerHTML;
     var el2 = document.querySelector('.nvsrc.'+edi);
     var nv = el2.innerHTML;     
     s = s.substring('<!--'.length, s.length - '-->'.length);
     s = s.replace(/\<===/g, '<!--');    
     s = s.replace(/===\>/g, '-->');
     s = s.replace(/###navph###/g, nv);
     document.getElementById('spxhdsrc').innerHTML = '';
     document.write(s);
   </script>
   <!-- Google Tag Manager -->

    </iframe>
   </noscript>

         '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
         })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-5KQH9D');
   </script>

      <div class="pgCenterC" id="spxCt">

        var arD = [

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var dazn = window.dazn || {};
 dazn.daznLiveWidget=function(id){
   this.el = document.getElementById(id);
   this.elScroll = this.el.querySelector('.inner')
   var viewWidth = this.elScroll.offsetWidth;
   var viewLeft = this.elScroll.offsetLeft;
   var ctWidth = this.el.querySelector('.inner .measurePoint').offsetLeft;
   this.scrollMax = ctWidth - viewWidth - viewLeft;
   var itmWidth = this.elScroll.querySelector('.itm').offsetWidth;
   this.stepWidth = Math.floor(viewWidth / itmWidth) * itmWidth;
   this.scrollV = 0; 
   /*console.log('%c' + 'viewWidth: ' + viewWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'ctWidth: ' + ctWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'viewLeft: ' + viewLeft, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'scrollMax: ' + this.scrollMax, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');
   console.log('%c' + 'stepWidth: ' + this.stepWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');*/
 
 
   this.eNL = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .left');
   this.eNR = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .right');
   if (this.scrollMax > 1) {
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', false);
   }
   
   var T = this;
   this.eNR.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll( 1);});  
   this.eNL.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll(-1);});
 }
 dazn.daznLiveWidget.prototype={
   scroll : function (v) {
     try { countPI(); } catch (ex) {}
     // google analytics track rotation by click
     try {
       var metricValue = '1';
       ga('set', 'metric1', metricValue);
       ga('send', 'event', 'daznscroll', 'click');
     } catch (ex) {}
 
     // no action scroll is at start
     if (v < 0 && this.scrollV == 0) {return;}
     // no action if text is at end
     if (v > 0 && this.scrollV >= this.scrollMax) {return;}
 
     this.scrollV = this.scrollV + this.stepWidth * v;
     if (this.scrollV < 0) this.scrollV = 0;
     if (this.scrollV > this.scrollMax) {this.scrollV = this.scrollMax;}
     this.elScroll.setAttribute('style', 'transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 600ms;transform: translate3d(-'+this.scrollV+'px, 0px, 0px);');
     
     spx.setClass(this.eNL, 'off', v <  1 && this.scrollV == 0);
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', v > -1 && this.scrollV == this.scrollMax);
 
     window.setTimeout('spx.dynpics.activateVisiblePicturefills();', 600);
   }
   
 }
         </script>

     (function() {
         function loadChartbeat() {
             window._sf_endpt = (new Date()).getTime();
             var e = document.createElement('script');
             e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript');
             e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
             e.setAttribute('src', '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js');
             document.body.appendChild(e);
         }

             loadChartbeat : function() {
                 oldonload();
                 loadChartbeat();
             };

    spx.getBlueKaiValues = function () {
   var o = {};
   var translatePageType = {
     "ticker":"live",
     "home":"homepage",
     "index":"list",
     "newslist":"list",
     "diashow":"gallery" 
   }
   o.pageType = translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] ? translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] : spx.pgi.pageType;  
   if (o.pageType == 'article') {
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 6) o.pageType = 'match';
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 4) o.pageType = 'live';
   }
 
   //o.pagePrimaryTag = spx.pgi.catNames.split('/').pop();
   o.pagePrimaryTag = 'Tennis';
   if (spx.pgi.author) {
     o.pageAuthor = spx.pgi.author; 
   }
   o.ul = spx.cntr.getOrig().toUpperCase();
   
   return o;
 };
 
 
 window.bk_async = function() {
 
   //console.log("%c BlueKai ", 'background: #22a; color: #fff; font-size: 24px; padding:3px;');
 
   var o = spx.getBlueKaiValues();

   bk_addPageCtx('page_primary_tag', o.pagePrimaryTag);
   if (o.pageAuthor) {
     bk_addPageCtx('page_author', o.pageAuthor);    
   }
   bk_addPageCtx('user_country_code', o.ul);
   bk_addPageCtx('user_language_code', 'de-' + o.ul);
 
   BKTAG.doTag(54514, 1); 
 };

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var edi = spx.cntr.get();
     var el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     if (!el) {
       edi = spx.cntr.getOrig();
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     if (!el) {
       edi = "de";
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     var s = el.innerHTML;
     var el2 = document.querySelector('.nvsrc.'+edi);
     var nv = el2.innerHTML;     
     s = s.substring('<!--'.length, s.length - '-->'.length);
     s = s.replace(/\<===/g, '<!--');    
     s = s.replace(/===\>/g, '-->');
     s = s.replace(/###navph###/g, nv);
     document.getElementById('spxhdsrc').innerHTML = '';
     document.write(s);
   </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var dazn = window.dazn || {};
 dazn.daznLiveWidget=function(id){
   this.el = document.getElementById(id);
   this.elScroll = this.el.querySelector('.inner')
   var viewWidth = this.elScroll.offsetWidth;
   var viewLeft = this.elScroll.offsetLeft;
   var ctWidth = this.el.querySelector('.inner .measurePoint').offsetLeft;
   this.scrollMax = ctWidth - viewWidth - viewLeft;
   var itmWidth = this.elScroll.querySelector('.itm').offsetWidth;
   this.stepWidth = Math.floor(viewWidth / itmWidth) * itmWidth;
   this.scrollV = 0; 
   /*console.log('%c' + 'viewWidth: ' + viewWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'ctWidth: ' + ctWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'viewLeft: ' + viewLeft, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'scrollMax: ' + this.scrollMax, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');
   console.log('%c' + 'stepWidth: ' + this.stepWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');*/
 
 
   this.eNL = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .left');
   this.eNR = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .right');
   if (this.scrollMax > 1) {
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', false);
   }
   
   var T = this;
   this.eNR.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll( 1);});  
   this.eNL.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll(-1);});
 }
 dazn.daznLiveWidget.prototype={
   scroll : function (v) {
     try { countPI(); } catch (ex) {}
     // google analytics track rotation by click
     try {
       var metricValue = '1';
       ga('set', 'metric1', metricValue);
       ga('send', 'event', 'daznscroll', 'click');
     } catch (ex) {}
 
     // no action scroll is at start
     if (v < 0 && this.scrollV == 0) {return;}
     // no action if text is at end
     if (v > 0 && this.scrollV >= this.scrollMax) {return;}
 
     this.scrollV = this.scrollV + this.stepWidth * v;
     if (this.scrollV < 0) this.scrollV = 0;
     if (this.scrollV > this.scrollMax) {this.scrollV = this.scrollMax;}
     this.elScroll.setAttribute('style', 'transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 600ms;transform: translate3d(-'+this.scrollV+'px, 0px, 0px);');
     
     spx.setClass(this.eNL, 'off', v <  1 && this.scrollV == 0);
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', v > -1 && this.scrollV == this.scrollMax);
 
     window.setTimeout('spx.dynpics.activateVisiblePicturefills();', 600);
   }
   
 }
         </script>

            <div class="outer">
             <div class="inner">
              <div class="page">
               <div class="itm">
                <div class="teasMe">
                 <div class="med">
                  <img alt="Roger Federer hat in Stuttgart den 98. Titel auf der ATP-Tour gewonnen. Ein Mann steht noch vor ihm. Wer hat die meisten Turniersiege überhaupt?                   <div class="stoerer stoererDiaL s">
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="wrap">
                  <div class="tit">
                   <a href="/de/tennisnet/bildergalerie/1710/meiste-turniersiege/aller-zeiten-atp-tour-connors-federer-lendl-djokovic-sampras.html">
                    Spieler mit den meisten Turniersiegen auf der ATP-Tour
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div class="itm">

    spx.getBlueKaiValues = function () {
   var o = {};
   var translatePageType = {
     "ticker":"live",
     "home":"homepage",
     "index":"list",
     "newslist":"list",
     "diashow":"gallery" 
   }
   o.pageType = translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] ? translatePageType[spx.pgi.pageType] : spx.pgi.pageType;  
   if (o.pageType == 'article') {
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 6) o.pageType = 'match';
     if (spx.pgi.artType == 4) o.pageType = 'live';
   }
 
   //o.pagePrimaryTag = spx.pgi.catNames.split('/').pop();
   o.pagePrimaryTag = 'Tennis';
   if (spx.pgi.author) {
     o.pageAuthor = spx.pgi.author; 
   }
   o.ul = spx.cntr.getOrig().toUpperCase();
   
   return o;
 };

     if (window.innerWidth >= 1050) {
         gTagPlatform = "Desktop";
     } else if (window.innerWidth < 1050 && window.innerWidth >= 750) { 
         gTagPlatform = "Tablet"; 
     }
     
     dataLayer = [{
       'channel': 'home',
       'subchannel': '',
       'title': '',
       'contentType': 'Page',
       'contentID': '3001060',
       'country': 'DE',
       
     }];
     dataLayer.push({'platform': gTagPlatform});
   </script>
   <div class="hidden" id="spxhdsrc">

   <script type="text/javascript">
    var edi = spx.cntr.get();
     var el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     if (!el) {
       edi = spx.cntr.getOrig();
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     if (!el) {
       edi = "de";
       el = document.querySelector('.spxhdsrc.'+edi);
     }
     var s = el.innerHTML;
     var el2 = document.querySelector('.nvsrc.'+edi);
     var nv = el2.innerHTML;     
     s = s.substring('<!--'.length, s.length - '-->'.length);
     s = s.replace(/\<===/g, '<!--');    
     s = s.replace(/===\>/g, '-->');
     s = s.replace(/###navph###/g, nv);
     document.getElementById('spxhdsrc').innerHTML = '';
     document.write(s);
   </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var dazn = window.dazn || {};
 dazn.daznLiveWidget=function(id){
   this.el = document.getElementById(id);
   this.elScroll = this.el.querySelector('.inner')
   var viewWidth = this.elScroll.offsetWidth;
   var viewLeft = this.elScroll.offsetLeft;
   var ctWidth = this.el.querySelector('.inner .measurePoint').offsetLeft;
   this.scrollMax = ctWidth - viewWidth - viewLeft;
   var itmWidth = this.elScroll.querySelector('.itm').offsetWidth;
   this.stepWidth = Math.floor(viewWidth / itmWidth) * itmWidth;
   this.scrollV = 0; 
   /*console.log('%c' + 'viewWidth: ' + viewWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'ctWidth: ' + ctWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'viewLeft: ' + viewLeft, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');  
   console.log('%c' + 'scrollMax: ' + this.scrollMax, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');
   console.log('%c' + 'stepWidth: ' + this.stepWidth, 'background: #222; color: #bada55');*/
 
 
   this.eNL = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .left');
   this.eNR = this.el.querySelector('.scrl .right');
   if (this.scrollMax > 1) {
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', false);
   }
   
   var T = this;
   this.eNR.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll( 1);});  
   this.eNL.addEventListener("click", function(){T.scroll(-1);});
 }
 dazn.daznLiveWidget.prototype={
   scroll : function (v) {
     try { countPI(); } catch (ex) {}
     // google analytics track rotation by click
     try {
       var metricValue = '1';
       ga('set', 'metric1', metricValue);
       ga('send', 'event', 'daznscroll', 'click');
     } catch (ex) {}
 
     // no action scroll is at start
     if (v < 0 && this.scrollV == 0) {return;}
     // no action if text is at end
     if (v > 0 && this.scrollV >= this.scrollMax) {return;}
 
     this.scrollV = this.scrollV + this.stepWidth * v;
     if (this.scrollV < 0) this.scrollV = 0;
     if (this.scrollV > this.scrollMax) {this.scrollV = this.scrollMax;}
     this.elScroll.setAttribute('style', 'transition-timing-function: ease; transition-duration: 600ms;transform: translate3d(-'+this.scrollV+'px, 0px, 0px);');
     
     spx.setClass(this.eNL, 'off', v <  1 && this.scrollV == 0);
     spx.setClass(this.eNR, 'off', v > -1 && this.scrollV == this.scrollMax);
 
     window.setTimeout('spx.dynpics.activateVisiblePicturefills();', 600);
   }
   
 }
         </script>

Tennisnet blickt auf die Karriere des großen Johnny Mac zurück." height="67" src="/de/tennisnet/bildergalerie/1802/john-mcenroe-karriere/116/miniatur-600_116x67.jpg" title="John McEnroe gilt als einer der erfolgreichsten Spieler aller Zeiten.    <script type="text/javascript">
    var _sf_async_config = _sf_async_config || {};
 /** CONFIGURATION START **/ 
 _sf_async_config.uid = 22788; 
 _sf_async_config.domain = 'spox.com'; 
 _sf_async_config.useCanonical = true; 
 _sf_async_config.sections = (typeof rubrik != "undefined" && rubrik ? rubrik.split('/').pop() : 'generic'); 
 _sf_async_config.authors = (typeof author != "undefined" && author ? author : 'generic'); 
  /** CONFIGURATION END **/
     (function() {
         function loadChartbeat() {
             window._sf_endpt = (new Date()).getTime();
             var e = document.createElement('script');
             e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript');
             e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript');
             e.setAttribute('src', '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js');
             document.body.appendChild(e);
         }
         var oldonload = window.onload;
         window.onload = (typeof window.onload != 'function') ?
             loadChartbeat : function() {
                 oldonload();
                 loadChartbeat();
             };
     })();
   </script>
